page.title: 07LOCAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: OLYMPIC GAMES. May - June. Pillow- fights on a pole about 2 metres from the ground, wellie throwing, tossing the caber and tug of war . Events are for men, women and children. GREEHOLME SHOW. June. There are competitions for ponies, pet dogs and sheep, Childrens sports from 4 years to 11 years, pillow fighting for men and women. In the old school building people show their cakes, handwork,jam, photographs and paintings. HARVEST FESTIVAL. October. When we celebrate the harvest festival, lots of people go to Church and Chapel.They bring vegetables, tinned food,fruit and flowers. BONFIRE NIGHT.November.Children in the village collect old wood and boxes and build a bonfire in a field near the George Hotel.The Headmaster lights the fire.There is a firework display.
